column1:
Direct editing is currently paused! Either add a suggestion to this sheet, or send an email to tehjammers@gmail.com and I'll add you directly.
You can find an OPML file for feed readers like Inoreader or Feedly at http://save.vs.totalpartykill.ca/blog/osr-opml/
OPML file maintained by Ramanan of Save vs Total Party Kill. This sheet maintained by James of Ten Foot Polemic.
